main.h1-title:
A man who works with his hands is a worker;
a man who works with his hands and head is a craftsman;
but a man who works with his hands, head, and
heart is a master of his craft.

about-us.p-1: We started our journey in the world of ceramics on the basis of the Horodnytsky Porcelain Factory. Since 1993, we have gained a lot of experience in the production of ceramic products. The history of our business is a testament to our dedication and skill.
about-us.p-2: Working in the city of Sloviansk, we were able to develop into a large factory, but later decided to move our production to a safer place. Now we are working with new enthusiasm, restarting production from scratch.
about-us.p-3: We produce urns for ashes, intended for both people and animals, embodying an individual approach and craftsmanship in every detail. With us you can count on a quick production - just a week, but we are also ready to take into account your individual wishes and orders, even if they take a little longer.

advantages.1: Our team is real professionals. We have 15 people, each of whom has extensive experience in the production of ceramic products.
advantages.2: Our urns are the embodiment of craftsmanship and an individual approach. We offer a wide selection of sizes and shapes, as well as the possibility of ordering urns according to your own sketches.
advantages.3: We understand that time is an important factor, so we provide fast production of urns - only one week.

manufacturing.title: STAGES OF MANUFACTURING
manufacturing.3-step: Useful firing at 800℃ in an electric furnace;
manufacturing.5-step: Flush firing at 1330℃ in a gas furnace;
manufacturing.6-step: Painting the product with overglaze paints;
manufacturing.7-step: Firing at a temperature of 800C in an electric furnace.

main.h2-title:
Choose an Urn That Reflects
Your Love

advantages.1: We also offer the service of making individual urns to order. Our craftsmen are ready to work with you to create a memorial urn.
advantages.2: A personalized approach will allow you to choose the shape, color, decoration. We will listen to your wishes to help you find that special urn that will be a worthy memorial.
advantages.3: Choose one of our ready-made options or give free rein to your imagination - we will be happy to realize your vision in a high-quality ceramic product.
